Company: Saint Mary's Hospital, Naugatuck Valley Community College
Description of incident: A Naugatuck Valley Community College instructor used patient X-rays from St. Mary's Hospital to teach radiology technology.  The instructor obtained the X-rays by using his Saint Mary's employee login to access medical records.  The X-rays were used without permission and contained patient names, dates of birth, and physician notes.  The instructor told students not to disclose the practice.
